TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectDataProvider extends System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider

summary.span: 包裝並建立可作為繫結來源的物件。

span.span: Wraps and creates an object that you can use as a binding source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 當沒有指定的型別或成員上執行反映的權限時，就會失敗。 fails when it does not have permissions to perform reflection on the given type or member. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的權限需求[繫結來源概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-sources-overview.md)。For more information, see Permissions Requirements in [Binding Sources Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-sources-overview.md). 有許多方式可建立要用做為繫結來源物件。There are many ways to create an object to use as a binding source. 比方說，您可以在這裡建立您的物件中的資源區段您[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]頁面上，或者您可以在程式碼中建立您的物件，並將它設為`DataContext`您的視窗。For example, you can create your object in the resources section of your [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] page, or you can create your object in code and set it as the `DataContext` of your window. 可讓您建立您的物件中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]並使其可做為繫結來源。 enables you to create your object in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] and make it available as a binding source. 它提供下列屬性可讓您在物件上執行的查詢，並繫結至結果。It provides the following properties that enable you to execute a query on your object and bind to the results. - 使用將參數傳遞給建構函式物件的屬性。Use the property to pass parameters to the constructor of your object. - 使用 屬性設為呼叫的方法，並使用將參數傳遞給方法的屬性。Use the property to call a method and use the property to pass parameters to the method. 然後，您可以繫結至方法的結果。You can then bind to the results of the method. 您也可以使用屬性來指定是否要在背景工作執行緒或作用中的內容中執行物件建立。You can also use the property to specify whether to perform object creation in a worker thread or in the active context. 當您想要取代您目前的繫結來源物件與另一個物件，並已更新所有相關聯的繫結時，這個類別也很有用。This class is also useful when you want to replace your current binding source object with another object and have all the associated bindings updated. 提供便利的方式，來建立和使用物件做為繫結中的來源物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，但它不會取代現有的資料模型。 provides a convenient way to create and use objects as binding source objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], but it does not replace existing data models. 如果您要實作您自己的資料繫結的物件，請參閱[繫結來源概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-sources-overview.md)資訊和建議。If you are implementing your own objects for data binding, see [Binding Sources Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-sources-overview.md) for information and recommendations.

summary.span: 開始建立要求的物件，可能會立即建立或在背景執行緒上建立，視 屬性的值而定。

span.span: Starts to create the requested object, either immediately or on a background thread, based on the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫和基底類別的方法。This method is called by the and methods of the base class.

summary.span: 取得要傳遞至建構函式的參數清單。

span.span: Gets the list of parameters to pass to the constructor.

value.span: 要傳遞至建構函式的參數清單。

span.span: The list of parameters to pass to the constructor.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以隱含方式變更這個集合會導致重新整理。Changing this collection implicitly causes the to refresh. 變更多個重新整理造成屬性時，使用建議。When changing multiple refresh-causing properties, the use of is recommended. ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ```xaml ``` ## Examples 在下列範例會使用反白顯示的線條的包裝函式為`Person`物件。The highlighted lines in the following example use an as a wrapper for a `Person` object. ``項目會顯示如何傳遞其建構函式的引數。The `` element shows how to pass a argument to its constructor. [!code-xaml[SimpleBinding#ObjectDataProvider.ConstructorParameters](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/SimpleBinding/VisualBasic/Page1.xaml?highlight=10-14)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出要在背景工作執行緒 (Worker Thread) 或主動式內容中執行物件建立。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to perform object creation in a worker thread or in the active context.

value.span: 如果在背景工作執行緒中 (Worker Thread) 執行物件建立，就是 ，否則就是 。

span.span: to perform object creation in a worker thread; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性就很有用，如果您要繫結會慢可供使用的外部資料物件。This property is useful if you are binding to external data objects that are slow to be available.

summary.span: 取得或設定要呼叫之方法的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method to call.
The name of the method to call.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性在物件上呼叫方法，並使用將參數傳遞給方法的屬性。You can use this property to call a method on your object and use the property to pass parameters to the method. 然後，您可以繫結至方法的結果。You can then bind to the results of the method.

summary.span: 取得要傳遞至該方法的參數清單。

span.span: Gets the list of parameters to pass to the method.

value.span: 要傳遞至該方法的參數清單。

span.span: The list of parameters to pass to the method.
The default is an empty list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性設為您的物件上呼叫方法，並使用將參數傳遞給方法的屬性。You can use the property to call a method on your object and use the property to pass parameters to the method. 然後，您可以繫結至方法的結果。You can then bind to the results of the method. 以隱含方式變更這個集合會導致重新整理的物件。Changing this collection implicitly causes the object to refresh. 變更多個重新整理造成屬性時，使用建議。When changing multiple refresh-causing properties, the use of is recommended. ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ```

summary.span: 取得或設定作為繫結來源使用的物件。

span.span: Gets or sets the object used as the binding source.

value.span: 物件的執行個體，此物件是從 及 或是將 用來做為 的 建構出來的。

span.span: The instance of the object constructed from and , or the of which the is used as the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定為非 null 值，所指定的物件類型的屬性會保存。When is set to a non-null value, the property holds the object of the type specified by . 如果指派使用者屬性會傳回指定的物件類型。If is assigned by the user, the property returns the type of the assigned object. 如果設定為，則會使用有效指派的來源提供者。If is set to a , the uses the of the assigned source provider as the effective . 如果使用時，並將不會更新直到呼叫。If is used, and will not update until is called.

exception.span: 同時指派了 和 給 ，但只允許一個。

span.span: is assigned both an and an ; only one is allowed.

value.span: 如果 並未初始化，或是明確設定為 null，這個屬性就是 。

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用時，並不會更新直到呼叫。If is used, and do not update until is called. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ShouldSerializeConstructorParameters() cil managed

summary.span: 指示是否應該保存 屬性。

span.span: Indicates whether the property should be persisted.

returns.span: 如果屬性值已經從其預設值變更，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因為屬性並沒有簡單的預設值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 這個方法會指出屬性是否已變更其預設值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 您通常叫用這個方法如果您正在開發的設計工具或是開發您自己的控制項併入。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .
